data: I suppose that I, Humphrey Arbuthnot, should begin this history in which Destiny has caused me to play so prominent a part, with some short account of myself and of my circumstances.

When the World Shook
Being an Account of the Great Adventure of Bastin, Bickley and Arbuthnot
